Green Dragonborn

Spit Acid, Druid class.

Green Dragonborn is a Subrace of Dragonborn in Baldur's Gate 3. Green Dragonborn PRIMARYTRAIT. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their special characteristics and some of them have Sub-Races which provide different Features and Traits.

Green Dragonborn Traits:

Green dragonborn are known for their green scaly skin, nature-related abilities, and affinity with plants and animals. They specialize in druidic magic and have a long, muscular tail.

Dragonborn Features

BREATH WEAPON.You can use an action to extol destructive energy. Your draconic ancestor determines the size, shape, and type of damage you turn.When you use your breath weapon, each creature in the exhaled area must make a saving throw, the type of the check determined by your ancient dragon. The saving throw DC is 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature takes 2d6 damage on a failed save and half as much damage on a successful one. The damage increases to 3d6 at 6th level, 4d6 at 11th level, and 5d6 at 16th level.

After using your breath weapon, you cannot use it again until you complete a short or long rest.

DAMAGE RESISTENCE. You have the type of damage resistance associated with your ancient dragon.

LANGUAGES. You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic. The Draconic language is known to be one of the oldest languages and is still used in the study of magic. The language sounds harsh to most creatures, including several consonants and tight syllables.

Green Dragonborn Lore:

The green dragonborn are a race of proud and honorable warriors, descended from an empire that strove for world domination. They are draconic in appearance, with leathery scales, clawed hands and paws, and red or gold eyes. Dragonborn value honor, excellence, and mastery of their abilities. They have abilities such as breathing acidic, freezing, flaming, electrical, or poisonous blasts. In addition, they are supported by the warlord, fighter, and paladin classes. Dragonborn seek out adventures to prove their worth and achieve perpetual glory.

Green Dragonborn Physical Appearance:

the green dragonborn is a rare variant among dragonborn, known for its green scaly skin and nature-related abilities. They are usually skilled in druidic magic and have a natural affinity with plants and animals.Green dragonborn have scaly skin that is green in color, with shades ranging from light green to dark green. They have a body structure similar to that of a human, but with reptilian features such as yellow or gold eyes and sharp teeth. Their scales can cover the entire body or be more concentrated in certain areas, such as the face, hands and feet. In addition, they have a long, muscular tail, similar to that of a lizard.
